email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I hope you're doing well. We have the vessel OCEAN BREEZE (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 300m) available for an iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is 150,000MT on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. The laycan is 15-20 Oct. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I can offer USD 18.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 16-21 Oct?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 16-21 Oct. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: OCEAN BREEZE
- Cargo: 150,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 16-21 Oct
- Freight: USD 17.75 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Sarah
